links.description: We believe that decentralization, in its current state, is difficult to use and while in hypergrowth - can be improved upon for greater adoption. links.title: Metaverse must run on blockchain and crypto tech, Goldman Sachs says
links.description: Goldman Sachs has said blockchain technology must be at the heart of the metaverse. It also heralded the crypto tech as one of the most "disruptive" trends since the early internet. Goldman said blockchain allows users to securely own assets and transfer them across virtual worlds.
